mapper.select: SELECT A.ROOM_LARGE_NO, A.ROOM_SMALL_NO, B.LROOM_NAME, A.SROOM_NAME, A.MAX_COUNT, A.STATUS FROM MEETINGROOM_MANAGEMENT A JOIN MEETINGROOM_CATEGORY_LARGE B ON (A.ROOM_LARGE_NO = B.ROOM_LARGE_NO)
SELECT A.ROOM_LARGE_NO, A.LROOM_NAME FROM MEETINGROOM_CATEGORY_LARGE A
SELECT A.ROOM_SMALL_NO, A.SROOM_NAME, A.MAX_COUNT, A.STATUS FROM MEETINGROOM_MANAGEMENT A WHERE A.STATUS = 'Y' AND A.ROOM_LARGE_NO = #{lNo}
SELECT EMP_NO, EMP_NAME FROM USER_INFO WHERE DEPARTMENT_NO=#{dNo} AND STATUS='N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RESERVE_LIST VALUES (SEQ_RESERVE.NEXTVAL, #{empNo}, #{roomSmallNo}, TO_DATE(#{startDate},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), TO_DATE(#{endDate},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), #{meetingName}, DEFAULT)
INSERT INTO ATTENDEE_LIST VALUES (SEQ_ATTE.NEXTVAL, #{attendeeNo}, SEQ_RESERVE.CURRVAL, DEFAULT)
mapper.select: SELECT A.ROOM_LARGE_NO, A.ROOM_SMALL_NO, B.LROOM_NAME, A.SROOM_NAME, A.MAX_COUNT, A.STATUS FROM MEETINGROOM_MANAGEMENT A JOIN MEETINGROOM_CATEGORY_LARGE B ON (A.ROOM_LARGE_NO = B.ROOM_LARGE_NO) WHERE A.STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT A.RESERVE_NUM, A.EMP_NO, A.ROOM_SMALL_NO, C.LROOM_NAME, B.SROOM_NAME, A.START_DATE, A.END_DATE, A.MEETING_NAME, A.STATUS FROM RESERVE_LIST A JOIN MEETINGROOM_MANAGEMENT B ON (A.ROOM_SMALL_NO = B.ROOM_SMALL_NO) JOIN MEETINGROOM_CATEGORY_LARGE C ON (B.ROOM_LARGE_NO = C.ROOM_LARGE_NO)
A.RESERVE_NUM = ${resNo}
SELECT A.ATTENDEE_NUM, A.ATTENDEE_NO, B.EMP_NAME, A.RESERVE_NUM, A.STATUS FROM ATTENDEE_LIST A JOIN USER_INFO B ON (A.ATTENDEE_NO = B.EMP_NO) WHERE A.RESERVE_NUM = ${resNo}

SELECT A.ROOM_LARGE_NO, A.ROOM_SMALL_NO, B.LROOM_NAME, A.SROOM_NAME, A.MAX_COUNT, A.STATUS FROM MEETINGROOM_MANAGEMENT A JOIN MEETINGROOM_CATEGORY_LARGE B ON (A.ROOM_LARGE_NO = B.ROOM_LARGE_NO) WHERE A.STATUS = 'Y' AND A.ROOM_SMALL_NO = ${roomSmallNo}
